channel.title: Services on Pratik K Shah, Practicing Company Secretaries
channel.description: Recent content in Services on Pratik K Shah, Practicing Company Secretaries

item.title: Company Incorporation & Startup Advisory
item.description: End-to-end support for registering companies, LLPs, and startups across India.

item.title: Corporate Compliance & Annual Filings
item.description: Stay on top of ROC filings, board meetings, and statutory registers with ease.

item.title: FEMA & RBI Compliance for Foreign Investments
item.description: Advising on FDI, ODI, and cross-border transactions under FEMA and RBI regulations.

item.title: Corporate Governance & Secretarial Audit
item.description: Enhancing transparency, accountability, and compliance for listed and large companies.

item.title: Corporate Law Advisory & Governance Best Practices
item.description: Expert guidance on Companies Act, SEBI regulations, and governance frameworks.

item.title: Mergers, Acquisitions & Restructuring
item.description: End-to-end legal and compliance support for business restructuring and growth.
